name: The Phantom Wiper
description: You appear low-maintenance, but your emotional cleanup process is mysteriously endless. You tell people you're fine while doing 17 invisible follow-up checks.

name: The Cling-On Architect
description: You build intricate attachments that survive every flush of reality. Loyal, persistent, and occasionally impossible to detach from old storylines.

name: The Panic Flusher
description: At the first sign of emotional weight, you hit eject. Fast decisions, faster exits, and selective memory after every intense moment.

name: The Ceremonial Sitter
description: You process life slowly and with intention. Your attachment style is thoughtful, ritualized, and mildly dramatic in presentation.

name: The Avoidant Marble
description: Compact, controlled, and difficult to crack. You prize composure, avoid mess, and reveal vulnerability in tiny, polished fragments.

name: The Oversharing Soft-Serve
description: Warm, expressive, and immediate. You connect fast, feel deeply, and sometimes overflow details before trust scaffolding is fully built.

name: The Chaotic Comet
description: You arrive with force, leave a mark, and move on unpredictably. High intensity bonds, low consistency, undeniable charisma.

name: The Stoic Boulder
description: Steady and dependable under pressure. You take time to open up, but once attached, you become a calm and unshakable anchor.

name: The People-Pleasing Spiral
description: You keep relationships moving by adapting constantly. Flexible, generous, and occasionally at risk of forgetting your own boundaries.

name: The Golden-Hour Glider
description: Balanced, breezy, and emotionally aerodynamic. You blend warmth and independence, making connection feel effortless and clean.
